means: 不仁慈的，无人道的，冷酷无情的

sentence.Network_en: He got his first insight into how inhumane employers can be.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对雇主的冷酷无情第一次有了深刻认识。

sentence.Network_en: Turning refugees away would be an inhumane action.
sentence.Network_cn: 拒绝收容难民是不人道的行为。

sentence.Network_en: The new weapon was too inhumane to be used.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种新式武器太惨无人道而不宜使用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... disaffection n. 不满 inhumane a. 不人道的，残忍的 civil a. 国民的，民用的；国内的，民间的.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... inhuman adj． 残忍的 | inhumane adj 不近人情的 outrage n． 残暴、暴行 |.
薄情英语怎么说_百度知道 ... 薄情的，冷酷的3. disobliging  adj. 不亲切的，不体贴的，薄情的4. inhumane  adj.
3 ... Perplex 使……杂乱/疑虑/不安 Inhumane 不仁慈的，不人道的 Ruthless 残忍的，无情的.

list.abs: I think this is deliberate on the government's part . inhumane methods of euthanasia are used . unqualified are euthanising these poor defenseless creatures who writhe and die in absolute agony .我认为政府是明知故犯，在这些死牢里以不人道的方式安乐死，这些没受过训练，不符合资格的人，负责将这些可怜、没有防御能力的动

and though he did find evidence of isolated cases of rape , inhuman treatment and " wilful killing " of civilians , they were not sufficiently widespread to meet the threshold of gravity required .最后，他的确发现数起个案针对平民的强奸、人道待遇和“故意谋杀”并找到证据，但这些情况并未蔓延到需要给予严重关注的地步
She is an inhumane judge ., 她是个冷酷的法官.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'inhuman, brutal'): originally a variant of inhuman (rare after 1700); in modern use from in- 'not' + humane (the current sense dating from the early 19th cent.)

entry.def: If you describe something as inhumane, you mean that it is extremely cruel.

example.ex: He was kept under inhumane conditions...
example.tran: 他的关押环境惨无人道。

example.ex: He got his first insight into how inhumane employers can be.
example.tran: 他对雇主的冷酷无情第一次有了深刻认识。

means.word_mean: 1. lacking and reflecting lack of pity or compassion;

sentences.sentence: "humans are innately inhumane; this explains much of the misery and suffering in the world"
"biological weapons are considered too inhumane to be used"

auth_sentence.content: I'd say your line should read so inhumane.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd say your line should read so inhumane.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd say your line should read so inhumane.

auth_sentence.content: Surely there are humane and inhumane practitioners of science.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surely there are humane and inhumane practitioners of science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surely there are humane and inhumane practitioners of science.

auth_sentence.content: Testing on animals is inhumane, cruel and unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Testing on animals is inhumane, cruel and unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Testing on animals is inhumane, cruel and unnecessary.
